job description:
JD:
  • Design, model and develop complex reporting and predictive analytics models using "R": - Participate in planning and implementing the reporting solution. : - Coordinate with team members to perform report development based on project requirements. : - Interview clients for reporting requirements. : - Perform quality assurance tests for ensuring report validation. : - Interact with project leaders to understand project requirements. : - Provide valid inputs in database architectural discussions. : - Assist in identifying process improvements for reporting performance and self service BI. : - Perform troubleshooting and analysis to assess root cause of data issues in a timely manner. : - Understands best practices for Data Analytics and Predictive Analytics modeling Requirements: - 2-4 years of Analytics using R - 3+ years of SQL experience
